✱  Medicines should be taken according to the dosage and for the duration prescribed.
✱  In order to prevent typhoid, drinking water must be from a safe source.
✱  Hands must always be washed before and after eating food. 
✱  Eating street foods must be avoided, especially open, cut-fruits.
✱  Effort must be made to eat only freshly-cooked food. 
✱  One should make sure that the cooked food that is to be consumed or eaten after some time is kept safe from 
contamination by insects. It should be kept in a cool, clean 
and dry place. If a refrigerator is available, one can store unused food in it.

✱  Maintenance of personal hygiene and appropriate waste disposal is necessary.
✱  In case one is travelling to a typhoid high-risk area, the health care worker 
must be consulted for typhoid vaccination.
